track.name: If It Happens Again
comments: Shame there's not a 12" version of this floating around. Love the bassline and synths on this.
Apparently the lyrics concerned the band's intention to leave the UK if Margaret Thatcher was re-elected in 1984. She was and they didn't.

yes, sweet dub bassline.
